entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
